attributes.action: Abolish monthly pay to all U.K employees earning less than £30k per year after tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: monthly pay is a nightmare for people across the country who are not fortunate enough to have a high paying career. people struggle to budget their money for 4/5 weeks and why should they have to? It's the greed of banks and multi-million pound companies that force people into near poverty, in the year 2007 nobody of full time employment should be losing sleep over  how many more weeks they have to wait to be paid again. Most of us would not be allowed to take 4/5 weeks holiday so why be forced to wait that long to be paid. it is time to stop the monthly pay
